EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2017-02-22-5.7 Release Webinar.EMAIL-Follow Up Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Attending our New Product Release Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}}, Thank you for attending our New Product Release Webinar. Please feel free to watch the webinar on demand at your convenience! You can find the recording here <[[https://turbonomic.com/thx-wbnr-recrd-thank-you-turbonomic-5-7-5-8-release-webinar/]]>. If you have not already, please take 30 seconds to fill out our brief webinar survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/Turboreleasesurvey]]> and let us know what you thought! If you have any questions about the webinar please reach out to your account representative or Marketing@Turbonomic.com.
- The TurbonomicÂ Team
